definition[0]: if you can see something with the naked eye, you can see it without using any artificial help such as a telescope or microscope

definition[1]: if you can see something with the naked eye, you can see it without using anything to help you, such as a telescope
example[2]: Through his telescope he could see millions of stars that were invisible to the naked eye.
